lines.text: This is my own body. I can do what I like. I can gain weight if I like, and I can cut my own hair.
One life! Thats all! You'll not get the last years back.
A person needs to be needed and if you don't need me, you could lie.
Time has come for me to embrace my years, don't you think, Mother? Welcome them, not fight them anymore.
Why should you embrace your years? No one else does.
You're like to be packing shelves at Safeway.
A happy woman doesn't mutilate herself.
